description_html: Escape to a dark and dreamy forest, where new colors such as Hunt Green, Earl Grey, and New Blue, intertwine with neutral HOLLY HUNT staples. These rich tones evoke a moody and romantic aesthetic with a range of diverse textures from nubby linens to flowing sheers. Welcoming digitally printed and silk screened velvets, while expanding upon popular categories such as double-wide sheers, embroideries, and best-selling leathers.
